definition: Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Wutai Mountain located at Shanxi Province northeast within the boundaries of Wutai County.
sentences.chinese: 五台山位于山西省东北部五台县境内。

sentences.english: Results show that it is in the Wutai mountain area that convective storms happened frequently.
sentences.chinese: 指出五台山是强对流天气的多发区。

sentences.english: Mount Wutai in China as one of the four famous Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 五台山为我国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Did you watch the football game in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五台山体育馆看足球赛了吗？

sentences.english: Did you watch the football match in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五台山体育馆看足球比赛了吗？

sentences.english: In the Mount are second to none.
sentences.chinese: 在五台山是首屈一指的。

sentences.english: So people in Wutai Mountain constructed temples and built Buddha statue.
sentences.chinese: 于是，清凉世界五台山就大兴土木，筑寺造像。

sentences.english: Early Proterozoic high-pressure metamorphism in the Wutaishan.
sentences.chinese: 五台山早元古代高压变质作用研究。

sentences.english: Mount Wutai, there is a bird, called the cold insect numbers.
sentences.chinese: 五台山上有一种鸟，叫做寒号虫。

sentences.english: Especially after he toured Wutai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是巡游五台山之后。

one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
